query:
SELECT pf.*, pc.name as category_name 
FROM product_filters pf 
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON pf.category_id = pc.id 
WHERE pf.user_id = 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2LSjgciXE5U7gJN.root --database AE5tzfuADY2nWPRKhfHJC3 --execute SELECT pf.*, pc.name as category_name 
FROM product_filters pf 
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON pf.category_id = pc.id 
WHERE pf.user_id = 1;
